meanings.sent1: The idea was unpatentable because it was too similar to existing inventions.
meanings.sent2: The company decided not to pursue the unpatentable product due to legal restrictions.
meanings.sent3: It was quite unpatentable to claim ownership of something that already belonged to everyone.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was like an unpatentable treasure, freely available for all to enjoy.
meanings.sent5: The concept of love is unpatentable, as it cannot be restricted or owned by anyone.
